ReasonProgress.content: We're sad to see a fellow environmental advocate leave! Please share why you're considering account deletion. Your feedback helps us enhance the app and support our eco-conscious community.

category.LACK_OF_TIME: Lack of time for environmental activities
category.LACK_OF_NECESSITY: Infrequent use or lack of necessity

DeleteConfirmModal.title: Delete an Account
DeleteConfirmModal.content: Your account will be deactivated, and all personal data, including coins, will be deleted after 30 days. To reactivate, simply log in to EarthMera.
toasts: Your account has been successfully deleted. Thanks for using our service.

OwnGroupModal.title: You own a group!
OwnGroupModal.content: To delete your account, you must first delete all groups you own.

idealcustomer.content: EarthMera offers highly effective mobile-optimized advertising targeting precise consumer segments within the rapidly growing environmental market.

items.title: Unity
items.content: Alone we can do so little, together we can do so much.

items.title: Progress
items.content: Effort in the right direction is always welcome.

items.title: Support
items.content: Communication is important, but it should be aimed at helping each other.

items.title: Humbleness
items.content: Humility is the key to progress.

items.title: Humanity
items.content: It's not AI that changes the world, but people.

items.title: Resilience
items.content: From adversity to triumph: the underdog's relentless pursuit of victory.

partners.header: How does EarthMera derive its value?

Users.description: Every click with EarthMera amplifies your contribution to our planet. Capture your eco-actions, earn rewards, and join a community that’s reshaping the world. With every action you take, you’re not just securing points for yourself but ensuring a greener future for the next generation.

Partners.description: EarthMera thrives on powerful alliances. We collaborate with brands eager to resonate with eco-conscious audiences, industries aiming to reduce their carbon footprint, and organizations looking to champion green initiatives. Together, we are not just endorsing sustainability; we are mainstreaming it.

Blog.guideText: The cards displayed in the our app are also showcased here

fundsData.head: Connect
fundsData.content: We find a corporate investor to sponsor your festival.

fundsData.head: Go live
fundsData.content: Your campaign goes live with Eco-Action through our EarthMera.

fundsData.head: Action
fundsData.content: Users donate their sweatcoins to hit your fundraising goal.

fundsData.head: Release
fundsData.content: When the sweatcoin target is hit, the donor releases the funds.

modelData.content: Earthmera offers eco-friendly bio-based plastic bags to participants. Our AI, using computer vision object detection, verifies if the bags are filled as per the assigned missions, promoting environmental responsibility.

list.contents: We, EarthMera, have established a partnership with music festivals. Through this partnership, festival organizers define missions and EarthMera encourages participants to complete missions.
Through these missions, we minimize the environmental pollution caused by festival participants, leading to significant cost savings on cleanup expenses.

b2bvideo.content: Ready to make a strong ESG statement?

solutions.title: All entertainment businesses that sell tickets.
solutions.content: Users can earn rewards and extract data by helping with environmental improvement through the QR code on their tickets during entertainment.

solutions.title: Companies that manufactures eco-friendly products.
solutions.content: We promote your products in our app and offer user feedback and data reporting.

solutions.title: Businesses engaged in ESG management.
solutions.content: We offer MD data reporting to companies in ESG management facing challenges in quantifying their product's environmental contributions and ESG compliance level.

solutions.title: Other companies need the product statistics.
solutions.content: We provide statistical data and consulting services to interested companies through our platform to help them ensure that consumers are using eco-friendly products as intended by the company.

video_youtube.title: Do you use a Tumblr or an eco-bag?!
Keep claen the Music festival with EarthMera

earthmera.subheader: Make a change with one tap in EarthMera!

/Images/preview1.png.secondDesc: Click to create your own diary with Drop B

landingFestival.firstDesc: Save up to $324,400 in festival cleaning costs for free
landingFestival.secDesc: At major festivals, approximately 600 individuals are paid $15 per hour for cleaning during a span of three days. However, we encourage over 400,000 festival attendees to help maintain cleanliness.

landingOrganizer.firstDesc: Save up to 10% in the festival budget for free
landingOrganizer.secDesc: Even with over 2,000 cleaners, the festival always needed extra assistance. However, we enlighten over 400,000 festival attendees to help maintain cleanliness.

AboutUs.title: We're Looking for Eco-Action people.
AboutUs.content: Millions of people engage with EarthMera to verify eco-action and get rewarded while capturing.

content.head: Events
content.content: We work with entertainment, educational, and active events. We can create exclusive marketplaces filled with deep discounts and event partner products, accessible only to participants of your event. We also run friendly competitions with live leaderboard step counts and set targets for the participants to complete as.

content.head: Customer partnerships
content.content: We're eager to use our tech for good. We can build out customised partnerships to support humanitarian, animal welfare, and environmental issues.

partnersWay.header: More ways to partner with us

partnerModal.header: Unlock the power of user loyalty to boost Eco-Action.
partnerModal.rich: EarthMera is committed to protecting and respecting your privacy, and we’ll only use your personal information to administer your account and to provide the products and services you requested from us. From time to time, we would like to contact you about our products and services, as well as other content that may be of interest to you. If you consent to us contacting you for this purpose, please tick below to say how you would like us to contact you:
partnerModal.rich1: You may unsubscribe from these communications at any time. For more information on how to unsubscribe, our privacy practices, and how we are committed to protecting and respecting your privacy, please review our
partnerModal.rich2: By clicking submit below, you consent to allow EarthMera to store and process the personal information submitted above to provide you the content requested.

/Images/sketch1.jpeg.content: Providing players with a continuously rewarding experience while discovering new digital worlds at the tap of a button.

/Images/sketch2.jpeg.content: Building the leading play-and-earn solution that drives high user engagement for game publishers and advertisers on a global scale.

items1.title: Environmental Conservation
items1.content: Supporting individuals who safeguard the planet through daily eco-friendly actions, pioneering a green future.

items1.title: Social Responsibility
items1.content: Aiding ESG-driven companies to achieve authentic social responsibility.

items2.title: Economic Benefits
items2.content: Incentivizing environmental care with smart actions and big rewards.

items2.title: Social Culture
items2.content: Cultivating sustainable habits, EarthMera builds a journey towards a greener culture.

first.text: out of 6 trillion cigarettes, 450 billion are littered on the streets.

second.text: of the 460 million tons of plastic produced yearly, 353 million tons become waste, with just 9% being recycled.

third.text: of the 8.6 million tons of marine debris is plastic.

change.text: the numbers speak, it's time for us to act genuinely. Let's make a significant impact on our planet through our app.

bubble.text_part1: We are the creator of DropB
bubble.text_part2: Do you want to tag your day? Try DropB!

b2c.header: So I just get money for using any tumblers and eco-bags?

secDesc.part1: Earn money by snapping eco-friendly actions with EarthMera.
secDesc.part2: Let's make money and save the Earth.

platform1p.content: This app lets you earn points for eco-friendly photos, exchange them for rewards, and promotes eco-conscious behavior and community.

steps.head: Select a category
steps.desc: Tap a category for the Eco-Action you'd like to do.

steps.head: Capture Eco-Action
steps.desc: Easily capture your Eco-Actions in a photo or video.

steps.head: Take a reward
steps.desc: Earn EM coins every time you complete an Eco-Action.

steps.head: Check your impact
steps.desc: Check your environmental impact in real-time.

Badges.header:
Make Eco-Actions more fun with
bages & medals.
Badges.content: Each time you complete an Eco-Action, you earn experience points to level up and receive level badges. You can also unlock different medals for various Eco-Actions.

rewards.content: We've prepared numerous rewards for EarthMera heroes! Enjoy the process of earning EM coins as you contribute to the conservation of our planet.

YourImpactSection.content: Track your CO₂ reduction in real-time with every Eco-Action, and easily see how much impact you've made on the environment so far.

B2CEcoProducts.content: Turn your eco-friendly products into fun collectible cards. Each card shows how your products make an impact. Enjoy the excitement of building your unique collection!

B2CEcoServices.content:
Explore eco-friendly services you might not have known about and see how easy it is to make your daily life more sustainable.
Start using these services today and track your CO₂ reduction in real-time as you take steps toward a greener future!

comp.compContent: We monitor specific ESG-related indicators such as product lifecycle, Waste reduction, and Energy consumption reduction.
Evaluating the beneficial effects that a product or service provides to society.
Analyzing collected data to provide a statistical report on the achievement of ESG goals.

community.content:
Join schools, companies, or local communities for eco-actions through groups!

Create AI-powered challenges for daily eco-missions or host events to take action together at specific locations.

Stay connected with group chats and posts to share and inspire!

Start a plogging event with your group and make it even more meaningful with our biodegradable EM Bag, which helps track the impact of the trash you collect.

Take on fun missions like snapping before-and-after photos or selfies with your EM Bag while making a positive impact on the environment!

EM People and EM Heroes are EarthMera's dedicated posting spaces!

EM People is a platform where you can freely share eco-friendly ideas and posts, inspiring sustainable lifestyles.

EM Heroes showcases completed eco-actions, allowing you to post your achievements and see how others are making an impact.

usingb2c.content: Our platform enhances users' ability to engage in eco-friendly actions and, through the data accumulated from user eco-actions, we can measure the ESG compliance level of the product.

esg.header: Need better data on your ESG?
esg.content: EarthMera provides a platform to analyze how consumers use your products in line with ESG management, offering diverse and accurate reporting on how they consume and utilize your products.

diff.header:
The difference between regular
and bio-based bags.

items.title: Material
items.content: Bio bags from renewables, regular bags from oil.

items.title: Eco-friendliness
items.content: Bio bags eco-friendly, degrade naturally; regular bags harm the environment.

items.title: Biodegradability
items.content: Bio bags biodegrade fast, regular bags pollute slow.

bio-based.content:
EarthMera's BioBag not only enhances
EarthMera AI's object detection rate
but also serves as an eco-friendly
alternative to plastic bags
that are currently banned in many countries.

bag.header:
Choose a greener tomorrow
with our bio-based plastic bags.

biowork.content: Embedded with a QR code, the EarthMera Bio-bag offers an enhanced AI detection capability that quantifies the bag's contents precisely. This feature ensures not only greater accuracy but also detailed insights into the bag's fill level.

VisionIntro.header:
Awareness into Action,
Action into Lasting Habits.
VisionIntro.content: Awareness is everywhere—action isn’t. We use technology to bridge the gap, turning eco-awareness into sustainable action.

ourMission.content: Environmentally mindful individuals create a butterfly effect. We aim to amplify their impact, resonating across individuals, businesses, and the globe.

items.title: For individuals
items.content: EarthMera supports eco-conscious individuals. Snap eco-friendly moments on our platform, earn rewards, and inspire many others.

items.title: For businesses
items.content: With EarthMera, companies practicing ESG can enhance their social responsibility. We offer precise reporting tailored to their ESG compliance level.

items.title: For the globe
items.content: EarthMera is directly manufacturing bio-based bags to contribute to creating a more sustainable Earth.

futureModel.header: Guiding the future personal AI with Green technology and supercomputer vision
futureModel.subcontent: Through personalized experiences, enhanced creativity, and improved problem-solving abilities, our Personal AI not only elevates the quality of life but also innovates creative solutions to environmental challenges.

introApp.content: EarthMera is an innovative startup that rewards individuals who protect the environment in small ways in their daily lives. By incentivizing eco-friendly actions on a micro-level, we aim to inspire a growing community dedicated to making the Earth more beautiful.

heros.content: Small eco-friendly actions have the potential to inspire many, just like the butterfly effect. EarthMera will take the lead in shaping a societal culture that values the environment, with the collaboration of one million Earth heroes.

ticket.content: Utilize individual ticket codes as participant IDs. Distribute eco-bags before the festival, incentivize waste collection during the event, and reward verification. Encourage all attendees to pick up litter, ensuring a cleaner festival. Maximize efficiency and cleanliness at your event.

Create a group and enjoy
challenges and events together,
AI missions make it easy and fun!

HomePlatformShare.title:
Share your eco-friendly actions
or ideas with others!

HomePartners.title: Partners
HomePartners.description: EarthMera, in collaboration with diverse partners, is shaping new possibilities for a sustainable future.

lead the way in sustainability.

Turn actions into impact.

CO₂ with your service.

cards.title: Eco-Board
cards.description: Connect effortlessly with a community of eco-conscious individuals on EarthMera.

cards.title: Near Stores
cards.description:
Reach nearby users and make
your store their go-to choice!

PartnershipCarbonTracking.title:
Track the CO₂ reductions
of your products
PartnershipCarbonTracking.description: Register your products, and EarthMera AI will track the eco-friendly actions taken with them, providing you with accurate CO₂ reduction data.

PartnershipEcoBoard.title:
Boost your Brand
with Eco-Board
PartnershipEcoBoard.description: EcoBoard connects you with sustainable brands and eco-conscious organizations, offering easy access to information that inspires a greener lifestyle.

PartnershipShop.title:
Get Found by
Eco-Shoppers Nearby
PartnershipShop.description: List your zero-waste or vegan store on EarthMera and make it easy for eco-conscious shoppers to find you. Users can see your store's location nearby and connect with your sustainable brand, helping you grow your customer base and increase visibility.

TicketeerCarbon.header:
Track CO₂ Reduction
at Any Ticketed Event
TicketeerCarbon.content: Ticketeer tracks real-time CO₂ reduction as participants complete eco-missions at sustainability-focused events like music festivals, low-carbon concerts, plogging, and zero-waste parties. It also aggregates environmental data, offering valuable insights for event performance, promotion, and marketing.

steps.head: Rewards
steps.desc: Offer prizes or a lucky draw based on mission completion to boost motivation.

steps.head: Data Insights
steps.desc: Organizers can monitor CO₂ reduction and trash collected in real-time, with final data available after the event.

steps.head: Eco Championship
steps.desc: Participants can track their real-time rankings, adding fun and friendly competition.

steps.subtitle: Create Ticketeer Event
steps.description: Work with EarthMera to set up custom missions and rewards that align with the goals of your event, whether it's a music festival, low-carbon concert, plogging, or zero-waste party. Tailor the experience to engage participants and drive meaningful environmental impact.

steps.subtitle: Participants Access the Mission Page
steps.description: Participants can enter the event mission page by entering their ticket number or the event code provided by the organizer in advance.

steps.subtitle: Participants Access the Mission Page
steps.description: Participants will enjoy the event while completing missions set by the organizer. As they complete each mission, the corresponding CO₂ reduction is tracked and recorded for each participant.

steps.subtitle: Participants Earn Rewards
steps.description: Participants will earn rewards by meeting the criteria set by the organizer. This motivates them to stay engaged and complete more missions, enhancing their overall event experience.

steps.subtitle: Participants Can Join the Eco Championship
steps.description: After completing all missions, participants can join the Eco Championship. Based on how many missions they've completed, a ranking will be displayed, fostering friendly competition. This not only adds excitement to the event but also provides motivation for participants to keep engaging and performing at their best.

steps.subtitle: Event Organizers Gain Data Insights
steps.description: Organizers can access valuable data insights, such as CO₂ reduction and mission completion statistics, in real time. This data helps evaluate event performance, improve future events, and drive marketing and promotional strategies.

cards.title: Individuals
cards.description: EarthMera helps individuals build sustainable habits through CO₂ tracking, rewards, and community features like short-form content and groups.

cards.title: Group
cards.description: EarthMera brings the joy of togetherness. Take action together to make sustainability more fun with group challenges and plogging events!

cards.title: Business
cards.description: We help businesses offering eco-friendly services, products, or events use CO₂ reduction data to boost marketing and strengthen ESG initiatives.

cards.title: Government
cards.description: We support initiatives like student volunteering, municipal plogging, and local festivals by using CO₂ data to enhance policies and education.

ValueEMHeroes.content: Small eco-friendly actions have the potential to inspire many, just like the butterfly effect. EarthMera will take the lead in shaping a societal culture that values the environment, with the collaboration of one million Earth heroes.

ValueUserCount.title: EarthMera Heroes Around the World!
ValueUserCount.content: Together, We Make a Greener Future!

B2BEcoServices.title:
Track the Real Impact of
Your Eco-Service
B2BEcoServices.description: EarthMera AI tracks user actions and calculates CO₂ reductions, helping eco-services showcase their real impact. Partner with us to demonstrate how your business contributes to a sustainable future and inspires meaningful change.

B2BEcoProducts.title:
Certify Eco-Products
with EarthMera
B2BEcoProducts.description: EarthMera is looking for partners to certify eco-friendly products. Once certified, these products are turned into collectible cards, making sustainability fun and engaging while enhancing your brand's credibility.
